name: hofood
title: HOFood
description: Get todays food at mensas of Hof University of Applied Sciences
author: jannis6023

commands.name: get-todays-menu
commands.title: Mensa-Plan anzeigen
commands.description: Dieser Command zeigt die für die aktuelle Woche verfügbaren Mensa-Gerichte an.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
